comment: "Poor and inconsistent communication throughout, even down to the terms of the assignment. In the end, got paid less than what was agreed, but very promptly."

"While the rate isn't incredible, I would highly recommend pitching Bitch to any who wishes to. The editor was incredibly responsive and fun to work with, and I received payment 2 DAYS (!!!) after it was published."

comment: "Bitch Media is Bitch Magazine's online platform. They publish blog posts daily. the web editor told me that they pay $20 per blog post. They usually aim for around 1200 words per post, but mine was longer than that."
